attributes.action: Petition asking that Susie Boniface aka Fleet Street Fox be allowed to "live off state" and serve her country.
attributes.additional_details:
Ms Susie Boniface aka Fleet Street Fox has written in The Mirror, serving your country in the Army is "living off the state"
This petition is to respectully ask that Ms Boniface be invited by HM Goverment to "live off the state", risking her life, on the frontline in Afghanistan, like the rest of the freeloading service men and women who risk their lives on a daily basis to protect us.
